The end of cute

Monday, December 28, 2020

I have a friend
who is so mad
at the pandemic
that he went on
a six-day crack bender
just to prove it

of all my dealers as well as the
man who changed my mind‚Äù
he tells me
His eyes reflect a me
judging him for him
and I am
I have deleted numbers
deleted apps

versions of my

myself

childhood
friend on an
